name: linkedin-network-ui
description: A modern LinkedIn Network page UI built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run create-dist && npm run concat-css && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run cleanup
scripts.concat-css: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['reset.css', 'variables.css', 'main.css', 'header.css', 'sidebar.css', 'content.css', 'responsive.css']; const content = files.map(f => fs.readFileSync('src/css/' + f, 'utf8')).join('\n'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/styles.css', content);"
scripts.minify-js: npx terser src/js/utils.js src/js/data.js src/js/components.js src/js/main.js --compress --mangle --output dist/scripts.min.js
